name: 001 Game Creator - Point & Click Adventure Kit
detailed_description:
Suggestions

Got a suggestion for a new feature, resource or tutorial you'd like to see added to 001 Game Creator? Let us know on our Steam Forum: http://steamcommunity.com/app/347400/discussions/


About the Game

The Point & Click Adventure Expansion DLC provides 001 Game Creator users with a brand new template designed to create PnC games. The package comes with several pre-made assets/backdrops to allow users to immediately jump in and start building their dream PnC games. Players can build directly off this template or use the assets/scripts to create their own from scratch.

Feature Highlights:

  • 4 unique pre-made maps (Field, Castle Courtyard, Throne Room and Cave)
  • Dozens of additional set pieces/objects for Desert, Harbor and Town scenes
  • Male, Female and Child character sprites (with respective clothing sprites and walking animations)
  • 50 player-collectable items (including various Foods, Weapons and Miscellaneous objects)
  • Half a dozen particle effects including Flames, Fireflies and Water Sparkles
  • 6 changeable player interactions for Walking, Using, Talking, Looking, Eating and Managing Items
